alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 16 at 2:36PM PDT until June 18 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 65 mph possible. Blowing dust expected. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. For the Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust expected, which could lead to severely reduced visibility.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
